alert.note: Alert for Davidson; De Kalb; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; White; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Smith, southeastern Davidson, De Kalb, north central Rutherford, Wilson, northwestern White and southwestern Putnam Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rural Hill to Center Hill Lake. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Lebanon, Sparta, Smithville, Carthage, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Algood, Watertown, Baxter, Gordonsville, Rural Hill, Belinda City, Hickman, South Carthage, Alexandria, Doyle, Dowelltown, Liberty and Hamptons Crossroads. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 222 and 293. Interstate 840 between mile markers 64 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Davidson; De Kalb; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; White; Wilson
